entry.title: iamitpkumar/AutoGlide: AutoGlide is a lightweight and customizable infinite scrolling plugin designed by Amit P. Kumar. It enables seamless, automatic scrolling for images or other content in multiple directions, perfect for sliders, marquees, and animated galleries.
entry.content: AutoGlide is a lightweight and customizable infinite scrolling plugin designed by Amit P. Kumar. It enables seamless, automatic scrolling for images or other content in multiple directions, perfect for sliders, marquees, and animated galleries.

entry.title: GoodPie/html-typer: HTML Typer is a lightweight TypeScript package that animates HTML content with a smooth typewriter effect. It auto-sanitizes input, supports nested elements, and offers a React component for seamless integration—making your UI engaging and dynamic.
entry.content: HTML Typer is a lightweight TypeScript package that animates HTML content with a smooth typewriter effect. It auto-sanitizes input, supports nested elements, and offers a React component for seamless integration—making your UI engaging and dynamic.

entry.title: n1ru4l/envelop: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.
entry.content: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

entry.title: jpatel3/CodeToken: A lightweight Chrome extension that analyzes the token count of a codebase and suggests the best AI model for programming tasks. Designed for developers working with online repositories, it provides quick insights while ensuring data security.
entry.content: A lightweight Chrome extension that analyzes the token count of a codebase and suggests the best AI model for programming tasks. Designed for developers working with online repositories, it provides quick insights while ensuring data security.

entry.title: DraouM/StockFlow: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you’re running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.
entry.content: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you’re running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.
